Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve Supabase client initialization deadlock with API routes

The Supabase SSR client had an initialization deadlock that caused
getSession/getUser and database queries to hang indefinitely on the
client side. Fixed by moving all data fetching to server-side API routes.

Changes:
- Add API routes for players, weeks, fantasy teams, transfers, and user data
- Add server-side signout route to properly clear cookies
- Update Header to fetch user data \(including admin status\) via API
- Update my-team page to use API routes for all data operations
- Remove singleton caching from Supabase client to avoid stale instances

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
